name: Word Zoo
description:
Word Zoo is a brilliantly simple word game. “The perfect blend of Scrabble and Candy Crush.”
Play with the animal of your choice, each with unique abilities to change the way you play.
Find and enter words, use special tiles and power-ups to affect the tiles.
As you use letters, new letters fill their place, keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting!
Built exclusively for Apple devices.

KEY FEATURES

• 3 GAME MODES: Whatever your pace, there’s a game mode for you.
Race against the clock on Blitz mode, take your time on Zen mode or find the middle ground in Classic.

• COMPETE with Friends and others alike on Global leaderboards.

• CHOOSE a starter animal and begin playing immediately!

• UNLOCK and level up ability animals to help you get higher scores. Each animal has 1 or more unique abilities to aid you in your quest for high scores.

• DYNAMIC letter generator ensures no two plays are the same!

• WIN prizes daily on the wheel of fortune!

• Customizable color themes!

Word Zoo is created in the UK by brothers Max (@mxplmr) and Ollie Palmer. (@OllieSPalmer)

For support contact us on Twitter or by email: WordZooApp@gmail.com
